mapper.select: SELECT product_name, shoppingmall_name, warehouse_name, warehouseSectorColumnFinal.sector_column_final_code, stockStatus.stock_unit, stockStatus.stock_recent_warehousing_amonut, stockStatus.stock_recent_release_amount, stockStatus.stock_total_amount, stockStatus.ware_admin_id, wareAdminId.ware_admin_phone, stockStatus.stock_reg_date FROM kan9jun.tb_stock_status as stockStatus inner join kan9jun.tb_sector_stock_status as sectorStockStatus ON stockStatus.sector_stock_status_code = sectorStockStatus.sector_stock_status_code inner join kan9jun.tb_product as product ON sectorStockStatus.product_code = product.product_code inner join kan9jun.tb_contract_final as contractFinal ON product.product_code = contractFinal.product_code inner join kan9jun.tb_shoppingmall_user as spmUser ON contractFinal.shoppingmall_user_id = spmUser.shoppingmall_user_id inner join kan9jun.tb_warehouse_sector_column_final as warehouseSectorColumnFinal ON warehouseSectorColumnFinal.ware_admin_id = stockStatus.ware_admin_id inner join kan9jun.tb_warehouse as warehouse ON stockStatus.ware_admin_id = warehouse.ware_admin_id inner join tb_ware_admin as wareAdminId ON stockStatus.ware_admin_id = wareAdminId.ware_admin_id ; ON ss.ware_admin_id = wad.ware_admin_id ;
